protein.specific_function: Probable kinase that may be involved in a calcium- signaling pathway controlling neuronal migration in the developing brain. May also participate in functions of the mature nervous system

reference.reference_text: Omori Y, Suzuki M, Ozaki K, Harada Y, Nakamura Y, Takahashi E, Fujiwara T: Expression and chromosomal localization of KIAA0369, a putative kinase structurally related to Doublecortin. J Hum Genet. 1998;43(3):169-77.
